overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
PNG to WebP Converter is a free online tool for converting PNG images to lightweight, high-quality WebP format.
 WebP significantly reduces file size compared to traditional PNG while preserving transparency. It's ideal for web development, app creation, and improving loading speeds for landing pages and e-commerce sites. No installation requiredâ€”completely free and ready to use instantly.

steps.title: Upload PNG Images
steps.description: Drag and drop your PNG files or click the "Select Files" button to upload.

steps.title: Automatic WebP Conversion
steps.description: The conversion starts automatically upon upload, and transparency is fully preserved.

steps.title: Download Converted Images
steps.description: Click the "Download" button to save your completed WebP images and start using them.

users.name: User A (UI Designer)
users.comment: "I was creating transparent images for app UIs in PNG, but they were too large. Converting to WebP with this tool made them lightweight and dramatically improved loading times!"

users.name: User B (Landing Page Developer)
users.comment: "By converting PNG assets to WebP, we significantly improved our client's landing page speed. The preserved transparency is a huge bonus."

users.name: User C (Hobbyist Website Owner)
users.comment: "I was amazed that this free tool preserved PNG transparency perfectly. The conversion speed is fast with zero stress. I can't live without it now!"

items.title: Convert Transparent PNGs to WebP
items.description: Background transparency information is fully preserved in the WebP format, making it perfect for logos, icons, and decorative images. Enjoy both WebP's lightweight format and transparency.

items.title: Significantly Reduce File Size
items.description: While PNGs offer high quality, they tend to have large file sizes. This tool enables up to 80%+ compression while maintaining image quality, improving website loading speeds.

items.title: Browser-Based & Completely Free
items.description: No installation or registration required. As long as you have a browser, you can use it anywhere, anytime. Use it freely with no restrictions for your daily tasks.

items.title: Works on PC, Smartphone & Tablet
items.description: Optimized for multiple devices, allowing convenient conversion even from your smartphone while on the go. Designed to be user-friendly for designers, developers, and general users alike.

questions.question: Q1. What happens to transparent areas in PNG images?
questions.answer: A. If the original image contains transparency, it will be fully preserved when converted to WebP format.

questions.question: Q2. Which browsers support WebP?
questions.answer: A. All major modern browsers including Chrome, Safari, and Firefox support WebP. Some older environments may not support it.

questions.question: Q3. How long does conversion take?
questions.answer: A. Normal PNG images are converted within seconds. Even large images are processed quickly.

questions.question: Q4. Can I convert multiple files at once?
questions.answer: A. Currently we support converting one image at a time, but we plan to add batch functionality in the future.

questions.question: Q5. Is it secure?
questions.answer: A. Yes. Uploaded images are automatically deleted after a certain period and are not stored on our servers. Your privacy is protected.
